NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IDownloadProgress
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IDownloadProgress
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​DownloadProgressWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​DownloadProgressWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​DownloadProgressWindow

Interface for UI element that shows the progress bar and a method to install and relaunch the appliction

Events
DownloadProcessCompleted
event DownloadInstallEventHandler DownloadProcessCompleted

Event to fire when the download UI is complete; tells you if the install process should happen or not

Functions
SetDownloadAndInstallButtonEnabled
void SetDownloadAndInstallButtonEnabled(
bool shouldBeEnabled
)

Enable or disable the download and install button (such as when your "Can I gracefully close the window?" function is async and you don't want your user to click the button multiple times)

Parameter
shouldBeEnabled
bool

True if the button should be enabled; false otherwise

Show
void Show(
bool isOnMainThread
)

Show the UI for download progress

Returns

True if download was successful; false otherwise

OnDownloadProgressChanged
void OnDownloadProgressChanged(
object sender,
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs args
)

Called when the download progress changes

Parameters
sender
object

sender of the progress update

args
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs

used to deliver info on download progress (e.g.  total bytes downloaded)

Close
void Close()

Close the download progress UI

FinishedDownloadingFile
void FinishedDownloadingFile(
bool isDownloadedFileValid
)

Update UI to show file is downloaded and signature check result

DisplayErrorMessage
bool DisplayErrorMessage(
string errorMessage
)

Show an error message in the download progress window if possible.

Parameter
errorMessage
string

Error message to display

Returns

True if message displayed; false otherwise
